title: SLAUGHTER TO PREVAIL Streams "Russian Grizzly In America", Announces New Record
description: The bear is their new vocalist. The post SLAUGHTER TO PREVAIL Streams "Russian Grizzly In America", Announces New Record appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 6 hours ago
excerpt: The bear is their new vocalist.
text: Slaughter To Prevail has finally announced their highly anticipated new album Grizzly, due out July 18. Alongside the announcement comes a new single "Russian Grizzly In America" featuring a towering animatronic bear and UFC heavyweight fighter Alexander Volkov… because of course it is. "I think this is the best album we have ever written," said Slaughter To Prevail vocalist Alex Terrible. "We put so much effort into it. We spent a lot of time on every detail and really poured our souls into the songs. In the past, we were always rushing to finish albums and just releasing whatever we had. This time, we took our time, worked carefully on each track, and made sure everything was exactly how we wanted it. Hopefully it was all worth it." Grizzly features previously Slaughter To Prevail singles "Conflict," "Viking," "1984," "Behelit," and "Kid of Darkness." Grizzly's tracklist is: Banditos Russian Grizzly In America Imdead (feat. Ronnie Radke) Babayka Viking Koschei Song 3 (feat. BABYMETAL) Lift That Shit Behelit Rodina Conflict Kid of Darkness 1984 Pre-orders are available here. You can also catch Slaughter To Prevail at one of their dates below. 6/14-6/15 Washington, DC Vans Warped Tour7/18-7/19 Mansfield, OH Inkcarceration Music & Tattoo Festival7/26-7/27 Long Beach, CA Vans Warped Tour9/21 Louisville, KY Louder Than Life Festival10/2-10/4 Sacramento, CA Aftershock Festival11/15-11/16 Orlando, FL Vans Warped Tour Want More Metal? html:
Slaughter To Prevail has finally announced their highly anticipated new album Grizzly, due out July 18. Alongside the announcement comes a new single "Russian Grizzly In America" featuring a towering animatronic bear and UFC heavyweight fighter Alexander Volkov… because of course it is.

"I think this is the best album we have ever written," said Slaughter To Prevail vocalist Alex Terrible. "We put so much effort into it. We spent a lot of time on every detail and really poured our souls into the songs. In the past, we were always rushing to finish albums and just releasing whatever we had. This time, we took our time, worked carefully on each track, and made sure everything was exactly how we wanted it. Hopefully it was all worth it."

Grizzly features previously Slaughter To Prevail singles "Conflict," "Viking," "1984," "Behelit," and "Kid of Darkness." Grizzly's tracklist is:

  1. Banditos
  2. Russian Grizzly In America
  3. Imdead (feat. Ronnie Radke)
  4. Babayka
  5. Viking
  6. Koschei
  7. Song 3 (feat. BABYMETAL)
  8. Lift That Shit
  9. Behelit
  10. Rodina
  11. Conflict
  12. Kid of Darkness
  13. 1984

Pre-orders are available here. You can also catch Slaughter To Prevail at one of their dates below.

6/14-6/15 Washington, DC Vans Warped Tour
7/18-7/19 Mansfield, OH Inkcarceration Music & Tattoo Festival
7/26-7/27 Long Beach, CA Vans Warped Tour
9/21 Louisville, KY Louder Than Life Festival
10/2-10/4 Sacramento, CA Aftershock Festival
11/15-11/16 Orlando, FL Vans Warped Tour
